00006 #ifndef MCLEDS_H
00007 #define MCLEDS_H

00015 /* These routines are designed for multiplexing multiple colour LEDs
00016    with separate red, green, and blue cathodes.  The strategy used
00017    here is to continuously sequence the R, G, and B cathodes while the
00018    anodes are driven for a portion of each R, G, B period to control
00019    the proportion of red, blue, and green comprising each colour
00020    determined by a colourmap.
00021 
00022    For example, let's assume that the cathodes are asserted for 10
00023    clocks and we want a colour comprised of 6/10 red, 5/10 green, and
00024    8/10 blue we would generate the following timing sequence, where X
00025    denotes when a signal is asserted:
00026 
00027    R: XXXXXXXXXX                    XXXXXXXXXX
00028    G:           XXXXXXXXXX                    XXXXXXXXXX
00029    B:                     XXXXXXXXXX
00030    A: XXXXXX    XXXXX     XXXXXXXX  XXXXXX    XXXXX  
00031 */
00032 
00033 
00034 typedef struct
00035 {
00036     uint8_t duty;
00037 } mcleds_state_t;
00038 
00039 
00040 typedef struct
00041 {
00042     cleds_obj_t cleds;
00043     colourmap_t *colourmap;
00044     uint8_t colourmap_size;
00045     ticker8_t primary_ticker;
00046     mcleds_state_t *state;
00047 } mcleds_private_t;
00048 
00049 
00050 typedef mcleds_private_t mcleds_obj_t;
00051 typedef mcleds_obj_t *mcleds_t;
00052 
00053 
00054 /* State is an array of cols_num length for storing state for each led.  */
00055 extern mcleds_t
00056 mcleds_init (mcleds_obj_t *mcleds, 
00057              const led_cfg_t *row_config, uint8_t rows_num,
00058              const led_cfg_t *col_config, uint8_t cols_num,
00059              colourmap_t *colourmap, uint8_t colourmap_size,
00060              mcleds_state_t *state, uint8_t update_rate);
00061 
00062 
00063 /* Screen is an array of colourmap indexes.  Non-zero is returned
00064    when the colour drive is cycled.  */
00065 extern bool
00066 mcleds_update (mcleds_t mcleds, uint8_t *screen);
00067

00070 mcleds_off (mcleds_t mcleds);

00077 static inline uint8_t
00078 mcleds_disable (mcleds_t mcleds)
00079 {
00080     return cleds_common_set (&mcleds->cleds, 0);
00081 }

00084 static inline void
00085 mcleds_colourmap_set (mcleds_t mcleds, 
00086                       colourmap_t *colourmap, uint8_t colourmap_size)
00087 {
00088     mcleds->colourmap = colourmap;
00089     mcleds->colourmap_size = colourmap_size;
00090 }
